nodes.text: Irith was a polluted, motley and overcrowded planet located in the Irith system of Hutt Space, a region of the galaxy controlled by the Hutt species. The world was a stop on the Ootmian Pabol, a hyperlane that ran through the Hutt controlled area and connected Irith to the planets Du Hutta abd Nar Bo Sholla. Irith was the homeworld of the criminal Romort Raort, and while growing up there he acted as a bully, stealing other childrens' lunch money.

Irith was first mentioned in the Dark Empire Sourcebook which was written by Michael Allen Horne for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game in 1993. The planet's location in Hutt space was then revealed by the 2009 source book The Essential Atlas by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
